section.title: General client description
section.para: To show the available operations the client help can be displayed:
section.screen:
export CLASSPATH=MY_WORKING_DIR/ac/cadc-access-control/build/distributions/cadc-access-control-x.y.z/lib $MY_WORKING_DIR/build/distributions/cadc-access-control-x.y.z/bin/cadc-access-control -h Usage: Group management command line tool
--create --group=<uri> --get --group=<uri> --delete --group=<uri>
--add-member --group=<uri> [member]... --remove-member --group=<uri> [member]...
--add-admin --group=<uri> [member]... --remove-admin --group=<uri>[member]...
[member] can be a userID (string) or a group URI in the form: ivo://<authority>/gms?<group> eg: ivo://cadc.nrc.ca/gms?mygroup
